typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">High Pledged Promoter Holding</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Lower pledged promoter holdings is considered better</div><p class="jsx-1780307697 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">A significant proportion of promoter holdings is pledged</p></div></div></div></div><div data-section-tag="institutionalHoldings" class="jsx-1970749611 screensplit-elem section-spacer"><h2 class="jsx-1970749611 holding-title mb16 typography-h5 text-primary">Institutional Holdings Trend</h2><div class="jsx-1970749611 commentary-container"><div eventlabel="Clicked Holdings Commentary Item" class="jsx-1988423756 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-1988423756 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 icon-mood icon-positive-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-1988423756 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-1988423756 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Decreased Total Retail Holding</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Increasing retail holding can be considered bad as it can reflect that institutions and promoters are selling their stake which is being absorbed by retail investors.</div><p class="jsx-1988423756 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">In last 3 months, retail holding in the company has decreased by 5.96%</p></div></div><div eventlabel="Clicked Holdings Commentary Item" class="jsx-1156397974 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 commentary-item-root d-flex-row align-start justify-start "><i class="jsx-1156397974 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 icon-mood icon-neutral-comment text-24 mr12"></i><div class="jsx-1156397974 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-1156397974 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Foreign Institutional Holding</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Foreign Institutional Holding is quantum of stock held by foreign large-quantities-trading entities. Increasing value indicates growing support and comfort for the stock</div><p class="jsx-1156397974 jsx-1174656852 jsx-482152645 lh-138 text-13 text-secondary typography-body-regular-m commentary-desc">In last 3 months, foreign institutional holding of the company has almost stayed constant</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="d-flex align-center justify-center mob--only Vistra Corporate Services has been appointed as Security Trustee by SafeGold. Vistra has the first and exclusive charge over your gold held in vaults which means it has a charge over the gold over other commercial creditors till the time of fulfillment of delivery to you. Investors can access these reports to make informed investment decisions.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ec. Transparency: Blue-chip companies have a longer track record and, as a result, provide investors with more available data on their actions and financial activities, facilitating comprehensive analysis.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ed. Asset Manager Preference: Blue-chip stocks are favored by mutual funds, which allocate investments to balance risk exposure and enhance returns. These stocks offer higher liquidity and are actively traded on stock exchanges.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ee. Income Generation: Blue-chip stocks are attractive to investors due to their potential for long-term value appreciation. Additionally, these companies often distribute regular dividends, providing investors with a passive income stream.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ef. Higher Valuation: Blue-chip stocks tend to be more expensive compared to mid-cap or small-cap stocks, primarily due to their greater visibility and higher
